title: All Night Love, Stank Ass Vegans, Sheryl Underwood, Carla's Reality Update and more.
itunes:title: All Night Love, Stank Ass Vegans, Sheryl Underwood, Carla's Reality Update and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Gettin' you through today. Fool #2 must learn to let go! A Colorado jury did the right thing. There is nothing like disputes between neighbors. Our girl from The Talk is making arrangements for her boo thang that is designed to last "Until The End of Time" and she got some requests. As always you gets no love when you Ask Bitterman. Still gettin' it like he 20, the original cat daddy got some All Night Love just for you. Greg Leakes lost his battle with colon cancer and we offer our prayers to his family. Today the show wraps up with a fun fact about one of the crew.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
